property.name: SLA Service User
property.description: Run the SLA Service as the specified user

property.name: Client Name
property.description: Client Name. This must match the client name in the security level.

property.name: Project Names
property.description: Comma separated list of project names that must match the project names in JIRA

property.name: Response SLAs
property.description: Comma separated list of response SLA periods (P1,P2,P3) in ISO8601 duration format.

property.name: Fix KPIs
property.description: Comma separated list of fix KPI periods (P1,P2,P3) in ISO8601 duration format.

property.name: Operating Hours
property.description: The hours that the SLA applies within

property.description: Client Name. This must match the client name in the security level.
